text: main ( ) { int i , j ; int * * a ; int n ; int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = ( int * * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) a [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( i + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; else a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } printf ( "\n%d" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
